events.name: Join YoSinTV Telegram For Fast Links

styles.livee: display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center; padding: 5px 10px; margin: 5px 0; border: 2px solid #000; border-radius: 5px; cursor: pointer; background-color: red; color: white; transition: box-shadow 0.3s ease;
styles.liveeNote: flex: 1; text-align: right; font-style: italic; font-size: 13px; color: #ffcc00;
